meta.content: Broken Arrow Public Schools - Principals to handle student inquiries through email during coronavirus pandemic

If you have any questions or issues during the coronavirus pandemic, we encourage you to email your site principal:
Secondary Schools Principal
Broken Arrow High School
Elizabeth Burns
Freshman Academy Larry Lewis
Broken Arrow Academy Jack Pugh

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 70. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph becoming southeast 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 56. South wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 10 mph.
